attributes.action: The public should vote who is next Prime Minister after Theresa Mays exit.
attributes.additional_details:
Do you trust Boris Johnson with nuclear codes?
Or Jacob Rees-Mogg in Brexit deals, to get the best deal for us the people of the UK, and not for self gain.
If there was a general election, the public would decide. At this moment in time I believe that we the public should decide who takes us forward for the better.
attributes.background: The public should choose who is to lead this country into the next phase. It should not be down to Tory peers who have no sense of the reality of life for working people here in the UK.
